name: incontrovertibly
content:

in a way that is impossible to doubt because of being obviously true: Your assertion is incontrovertibly true. He is, incontrovertibly, a success. See
incontrovertible
More examplesFewer examplesNo hypothesis can ever be proved incontrovertibly.He maintains that the arrangement between the foundations is incontrovertibly illegal.One of the ways a movie succeeds is by convincing people that what they are seeing on the screen is incontrovertibly real.
